features: Sleek profile design with a matte, smudge-resistance finish
Plug & Play - Easy to use with no software to install

Pre-formatted NTFS for Windows PC (reformatting required for Mac computers)
body.description: Discover one of the easiest ways to free up space on your computer with Canvio Basics portable hard drive. Ready to use with your PC and no software installation required, simply drag and drop the files you want to save without slowing your computer down. Toshiba’s Canvio Basics offers high storage capacity in a new sleek compact casing for increased portability making it easy to save and access your files on the go. [Note]: (1) One Terabyte (1TB) means 10[12] = 1,000,000,000,000 bytes using powers of 10. Actual formatted storage capacity may vary. For details, please visit Toshiba's Consumer HDD website (2) Drive formatted NTFS for Windows PC. Reformatting required for Mac computers. Compatibility may vary depending on user‘s hardware configuration and operating system. (3) Product specifications, colors, features, and availability are subject to change without notice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Instant Storage One of the easiest ways to add storage to your computer with simple plug-and-play operation. Ready to use with your PC and no software installation required. Intuitively drag and drop files to and from your laptop or PC. Take it Anywhere Built for life on the go, the Canvio Basics makes it easy to carry and store your files in a sleek lightweight design that’s compact enough to fit in your pocket. Speed Up Your PC Free up space on your internal hard drive by transferring files to your portable hard drive. With up to 4TB[1] capacity, you can save your massive collection of photos, music, and videos without slowing down your PC.

Canvio Basics Portable External Hard Drive Storing your photos, videos, and data has never been easier. Toshiba’s Canvio Basics portable hard drive offers up to 4TB[1] of storage space in a sleek compact casing for increased portability. Simply plug it in to start saving and accessing your files. That’s storage made simple.

Simple, Add-On Storage Quickly add more storage capacity to your PC and other compatible devices, with up to 4TB[1] of storage capacity to store your growing files and content. USB Plug & Play Works right out of the box. Easy to use with no software to install. USB 3.0 & 2.0 Compatibility allows high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed. Sleek, Matte Black Design Sleek profile design with a matte, smudge-resistant finish. Drag & Drop to Save Files Simple operation to back up your files with drag & drop convenience. The Canvio Basics Portable Drive works right out of the box. Simple, Add-On Storage USB Plug & Play Sleek, Matte Black Design Drag & Drop to Save Files

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very compact, excellent price, and has not caused any problems. Very useful for my work, and an exemplar for long-term memory storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and easy
reviews.reviewText: Performed well--fast data transfer. Small form factor. Seems a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a great backup device
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of paying for online backup so decided to get a second backup device for photos and docs. This filled the bill economically and works well. Speed is great and no errors were found. Now I just rotate my drives about once a month and keep the spare off premise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, compact storage
reviews.reviewText: Love the ease of use. Lots of space for my needs. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Toshiba Canvio Basics 2TB Portable External SSD USB 3.0, Black
reviews.reviewText: I chose the 2TB model as I have read that they last longer, bought it to store video files and have used about half the available space. The drive comes in a nice case (black) and for me using Win 10 it was plug and play – convenient, very convenient. I’ve used it a few weeks now and everything is working well as to reading and writing. It is running cool to the touch too. There have been zero errors and it writes quickly even though my computer is a bit older.Only con is that I wish the cable were a bit longer as I have to sit it on top of the tower and would prefer it next to the computer. A minor complaint and I plan to buy another in the near future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars small footprint,large capacity,no software,no external power
reviews.reviewText: I have only had this for about a month but so far I love it! Its small and unobtrusive, I bought the 2TB but you can get a 1TB or 4TB if you need to. There is no software to worry about and no external power concerns. Its powered from your PC with the included USB cable. Its simple drag and drop or cut and paste. I moved my pictures and videos off my laptop and it was a breeze. I just bought my wife a new laptop and it is good but doesn't have the 1TB or more that I wanted. None of them did actually so I plan on buying a second one of these. Its fast and simple!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for archiving
reviews.reviewText: Bought this products for my son to offload files from his laptop to free disk space. It works great for this. He's also experimenting with it as a storage device to load games for his XBox series X. Should be fine for this as well. Very small footprint and loads of space. We all have tons of data that we need to backup. Get one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast efficient external drive
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE how quickly this drive copies files in comparison to the speed of a usb or thumb drive. I kinda wish I would’ve got a bigger storage capacity now that I know how great this thing is. It’s reliable and a great way to organize all my photos and files. Downside; I could not copy photos from my old Mac to it for some reason… idk if it’s just bc it’s an older Mac but it didn’t seem very compatible. I could view the files already on the drive, but that was it. Couldn’t move anything to it from the computer. I did get a slightly newer hp computer and this drive works VERY well with it. My only future concern is that the cord seems like it may wear down quickly and I’ll have to figure out a replacement, as the side of the cord that plugs into the drive is a very unique shape and sometimes seems like it comes out a little too easily but other than that baby concern I love this thing! I just purchased a 1 terabyte and needed it for large photography files, but Id gladly buy another one if this one fills up. Worth the price! Doesn’t get hot, doesn’t make any noise and does exactly what it’s intended to do!
Exactement à quoi je m’attendais. Cependant, faut trouver un tuto YouTube pour configurer pour MacOS
La vrd es muy buena compra por el espacio que ofrece y el precio esta muy bien eso si no funciona para juegos versión x/s pero los demas todo bien.

Quick and easy to use. Works great with my Sony UBP-X700. Quick and easy to use. Works great with my Sony UBP-X700. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ótimo HD, Externo, eu estou muito satisfeito com a compra, eu recomendo!
reviews.reviewText: O produto é de exelente qualidade, eu estou muito satisfeito e o recomendo, tem um exelente acabamento, funciona muito bem, e é bastante seguro, obrigado !
